item.title: 拉里·芬克的私募资产押注推动全球家族办公室热潮
item.description: 全球基建合伙公司（Global Infrastructure Partners）背后的前瑞信银行家们，最广为人知的是他们打造了全球最大的投资公司之一。如今，他们正在开创另一项事业：家族办公室。【原文：The ex-Credit Suisse bankers behind Global Infrastructure Partners are best-known for building one of the world’s largest investment firms. Now they’re also forging something else: family offices.】

item.title: 埃及降息周期延续至新年，通胀压力缓解
item.description: 埃及将降息周期延长至2026年，此举受到数月来最低通胀率和本币走强的推动。【原文：Egypt extended a cycle of interest-rate cuts into 2026, encouraged by the lowest inflation in months and a stronger local currency.】

item.title: 城堡公司启动两部分美国债券发售以再融资债务
item.description: 城堡公司周四启动两部分美国债券发售计划以偿还债务，所得款项可能还将用于与其多策略基金相关的一般企业用途。【原文：Citadel LLC kicked off a two-part US bond sale on Thursday to repay debt, with the proceeds potentially also earmarked for general corporate purposes tied to its multi-strategy funds.】

item.title: 尽管利率走低，美国二手房销售量仍创四年最大跌幅
item.description: 美国1月份二手房销售量出现近四年最大跌幅，当月不仅遭遇历史性低温，还经历了一场大规模冬季风暴。【原文：Sales of previously owned US homes fell in January by the most in nearly four years, a month marked by historically cold temperatures and a massive winter storm.】

item.title: 监狱供应商TKC借款23亿美元用于再融资和派发股息
item.description: 监狱食品供应商TKC控股公司周三通过发行垃圾债券和杠杆贷款筹集近23亿美元资金，用于再融资现有债务并向其私募股权所有者支付股息。【原文：Prison-food vendor TKC Holdings Inc. borrowed nearly $2.3 billion on Wednesday in a junk bond and leveraged loan deal to refinance existing debt and pay a dividend to its private equity owner.】

item.title: 美国股市基准指数反弹，交易员重启"风险偏好"策略
item.description: 美国股市周四开盘反弹，此前连续两个交易日下跌，因劳动力市场在失业救济申请数据中显现稳定迹象。【原文：US equities rebounded at Thursday’s open after two sessions of declines as the labor market showed signs of stabilization in jobless claims.】

item.title: 墨西哥地方债务复兴始于18亿美元墨西哥国家石油公司交易
item.description: 墨西哥国家石油公司时隔六年再度以比索借款，部分投资者认为此举可能为当地债务市场迎来至少二十年来最繁忙的时期。【原文：Petroleos Mexicanos is back to borrowing in pesos for the first time in six years, a move that some investors say could usher in the busiest season for local debt markets in at least two decades.】

item.title: 安科拉在华纳兄弟之争中可多方取胜
item.description: 安科拉控股集团——这家激进投资者周三突然加入华纳兄弟探索公司的收购战——因频频现身于高调并购案而引发轰动。【原文：Ancora Holdings Group — the activist investor that jumped into the takeover fight for Warner Bros. Discovery Inc. Wednesday — has made a splash by showing up in high-profile M&A situations.】

item.title: 印度最大液化天然气进口商称优惠条款是美印交易关键
item.description: 印度最大液化天然气进口商首席执行官表示，由于市场对价格极为敏感，印度需要获得有利条款才能与美国签订长期液化天然气采购协议。【原文：India will need favorable terms to enter into long-term liquefied natural gas purchase deals with the US as the market is highly price sensitive, according to the chief executive officer of the country’s top LNG importer.】

item.title: 纳瓦罗称，杰米·戴蒙必须降低信用卡利率
item.description: 白宫试图加大对摩根大通公司首席执行官杰米·戴蒙的压力，要求其限制信用卡利率——这是唐纳德·特朗普总统在推动解决可负担性问题过程中提出的要求。【原文：The White House sought to ramp up pressure on JPMorgan Chase & Co.’s Jamie Dimon to cap credit card interest rates, a demand of President Donald Trump amid his push to address affordability.】

item.title: 联合国粮食机构为科特迪瓦农业部门筹集2亿美元资金
item.description: 联合国粮食及农业组织计划为科特迪瓦农业领域筹集逾2亿美元的私人投资。【原文：The United Nations’ Food and Agriculture Organization plans to mobilize more than $200 million in private investment for Ivory Coast’s agriculture sector.】

item.title: 交易员向贝莱德基金注入创纪录资金，买入韩国资产
item.description: 贝莱德旗下的一只韩国芯片制造商基金周三创下史上最大资金流入纪录，投资者正加码押注亚洲半导体板块的上涨行情。【原文：A BlackRock Inc. fund packed with South Korean chipmakers pulled in its biggest inflow on record on Wednesday as investors doubled down on Asia’s semiconductor rally.】

item.title: 私募信贷涌入OneStream债务领域，尽管其软件存在缺陷
item.description: 由蓝猫资本公司牵头的私募信贷集团正提供14亿美元贷款，协助私募股权公司Hg融资收购OneStream公司，此举无视了业界对软件公司未来前景的广泛担忧。【原文：A group of private credit firms led by Blue Owl Capital Inc. are providing a $1.4 billion loan to help buyout firm Hg finance the acquisition of OneStream Inc., eschewing broader concerns about the future of software companies.】

item.title: EA债券持有人因债务操作导致价格暴跌而发起抗议
item.description: 即将接管艺电公司的私募股权投资者正策划一项债务回购计划，该计划重创了该公司的债券。如今债券持有人正联合起来，试图找出他们能采取什么行动——如果有的话——来反击。【原文：The private equity investors set to take over Electronic Arts Inc. are engineering a debt buyback that has hammered the company’s bonds. Now noteholders are banding together to figure out what – if anything — they can do to fight back.】

item.title: 雷诺旗下阿尔派车队退出耐力赛，专注一级方程式赛事
item.description: 雷诺集团旗下阿尔派运动品牌将聚焦一级方程式赛事，并于2026年底退出世界耐力锦标赛。此前这家法国汽车制造商宣布将控制成本。【原文：Renault SA’s Alpine sports brand will focus on Formula 1 and exit the World Endurance Championship at the end of 2026, after the French car manufacturer said it would rein in costs.】

item.title: 法拉利在意外超预期财报后摆脱最后卖出评级
item.description: 法拉利公司本周公布的业绩超出预期，促使这家超级跑车制造商最大的看空者不得不承认失败，该公司由此摆脱了最后一个卖出评级。【原文：Ferrari NV has shed its last remaining sell rating after better-than-expected results this week led one of the supercar stock’s biggest bears reluctantly to concede defeat.】

item.title: 奥迪多电信称客户数据在网络攻击中遭泄露
item.description: 荷兰电信集团Odido表示，其遭遇网络攻击导致客户数据泄露，但服务仍保持正常运行。【原文：Dutch telecommunications group Odido said it was hit with a cyberattack that compromised customer data, though services have remained operational.】

item.title: 墨丘利亚回购中国国有基金持有的少数股权
item.description: 墨丘利能源集团有限公司已回购其持股公司CNIC Corp.所持股份，标志着这家全球最大大宗商品贸易商之一结束了长达十年的少数股权持有状态——该股权由与中国政府有关联的企业持有。【原文：Mercuria Energy Group Ltd. has bought back its shares that were held by CNIC Corp., marking an end to a decade of minority ownership in one of the world’s biggest commodity traders by companies linked to the Chinese state.】

item.title: 英国烟草公司首席执行官称，多年来该公司一直就非法烟草问题向南非政府发出警告
item.description: 英美烟草公司首席执行官表示，该公司多年来一直警告南非政府，若不根除非法香烟销售，将被迫终止在当地的生产。【原文：British American Tobacco Plc warned South Africa’s government for years that it would be forced to end production there if illegal cigarette sales weren’t stamped out, according to the chief executive officer.】

item.title: 美国失业救济申请人数在严冬天气过后回落
item.description: 上周美国失业救济金申请人数小幅下降，此前因严寒天气导致申请人数激增。【原文：Applications for US unemployment benefits edged down last week following a surge during severe winter weather in the previous period.】

item.title: 巴基斯坦国际航空新东家计划为该航司进行首次公开募股
item.description: 巴基斯坦国际航空公司的新所有者计划在接管运营后一年内将该公司上市。【原文：Pakistan International Airlines’ new owners plan to list the carrier within a year of taking over operations.】

item.title: 金融科技巨头重启巴西IPO，结束上市停滞期，但复苏之路仍显坎坷
item.description: 两家在美国上市的巴西公司遭遇投资者兴趣减退和市场动荡的双重打击，这提醒人们，这个拉丁美洲国家刚刚复苏的首次公开募股市场是多么脆弱。【原文：A pair of Brazilian companies listing in the US collided with wavering investor appetite and market turbulence, a reminder of how fragile the Latin American country’s nascent initial public offerings revival is.】

item.title: 渣打银行将比特币2026年目标价下调33%，警告市场将面临更多下行压力
item.description: 渣打银行在不到三个月内第二次下调比特币价格预测，警告称该加密货币可能跌至5万美元后才开始回升。【原文：Standard Chartered has cut its Bitcoin price forecast for the second time in less than three months, warning that the cryptocurrency could slide to hit $50,000 before recovering.】

item.title: 欧盟委员会因向比利时出售房地产遭调查
item.description: 欧盟执行机构正因涉嫌向比利时出售房地产时存在不当行为，受到欧盟最高检察官的调查。【原文：The European Union’s executive body is under investigation by the bloc’s top prosecutors over possible misconduct linked to the sale of real estate to Belgium.】

item.title: 默茨与马克龙弥合分歧 承诺采取经济行动
item.description: 德国总理弗里德里希·梅尔茨与法国总统埃马纽埃尔·马克龙在欧盟领导人闭门会议前淡化分歧，此次会议旨在重启振兴欧盟经济的计划。【原文：German Chancellor Friedrich Merz and French President Emmanuel Macron played down their disagreements ahead of a European Union leaders’ retreat meant to jump-start plans to revive the bloc’s economy.】

item.title: 加纳考虑改革国内可可定价机制，因期货价格暴跌
item.description: 加纳正考虑对长期以来用于支付农民可可款项的定价机制进行全面改革，这表明期货市场的涨跌对主要种植者造成了压力。【原文：Ghana is considering an overhaul of the long-time pricing regime used to pay farmers for their cocoa, a sign of the pressure a boom-and-bust in the futures market has put on major growers.】

item.title: 丹麦养老基金ATP考虑削减美国投资敞口，因风险加剧
item.description: 丹麦第二大养老基金ATP表示，可能需要削减其在美国私募市场的投资敞口，该基金正与其他资产所有者一道重新评估美国投资相关的潜在风险。【原文：Denmark’s second-biggest pension fund, ATP, says it may need to cut its exposure to US private markets, as it joins other asset owners in reconsidering the potential risks associated with American investments.】

item.title: 莫里斯聘请雷迪扩充私募信贷二级市场团队
item.description: 莫里斯公司已聘请凯尔·雷迪领导其私募信贷二级市场业务，因交易活动放缓导致市场对这一细分领域兴趣激增。【原文：Moelis & Co. has hired Kyle Reidy to lead its private credit secondaries business, as slower activity in dealmaking has led to surging interest in this corner of the market.】

item.title: 人工智能初创公司获1亿美元融资，助力企业预测人类行为
item.description: 人工智能初创公司Simile在最新一轮融资中筹集了1亿美元，旨在帮助企业预测人类行为，包括推测客户可能购买的商品以及财报电话会议中可能被问及的问题。【原文：Artificial intelligence startup Simile has raised $100 million in a new round of funding to help companies predict human behavior, including by guessing items customers might purchase and questions that might get asked on earnings calls.】

item.title: 丹格特称炼油厂日产能达65万桶
item.description: 经过一年的逐步提升，尼日利亚丹格特炼油厂的部分大型装置已达到其额定产能——每日65万桶。【原文：Some of the largest units of the Dangote oil refinery in Nigeria reached their nameplate capacity of 650,000 barrels a day after a yearlong ramp-up.】
